name: WELLES
lines_with_token: You know Amy I've been sitting around in bars and everywhere following this guy... I mean is this what I get first thing? Before you even "hello you accuse me... ?
Hello Mrs. Mathews my name's Thomas Jones I'm a state licensed investigator...

name: ALEX
lines_with_token: Come come come Georgie Boy. You're a big strong chelloveck like us all. We're not little children are we Georgie Boy? What then didst thou in thy mind have? Confrontation. Georgie backs down.

name: DIM
lines_with_token: Hello Lucy had a busy night? Puts money in machine.

name: LARDFACE
lines_with_token: Hello heap of dirt. Pooh you don't wash much do you judging by the horrible smell.

name: CAREY
lines_with_token: Hello I'm Paul Carey from the airline. I'm here to pick up Captain Kramer.

name: MARGO
lines_with_token: Terribly sorry I'm late lunch was long and I couldn't find a cab - where's Miss Caswell shall we start? Oh hello Eve...

name: WOODWARD
lines_with_token: Hello I'm Bob Woodward of the Washing Post and... Mullen and Company Public Relations? Could you tell me when you expect Mr. Hunt? He is?

name: OWEN
lines_with_token: Hello Halberstam. Nice tie. How the hell are you?

name: ALVY
lines_with_token: Uh oh I don't know. It might have been Leopold and Loeb. Hello. Oh hi... Uh no what-what's the matter? What-what-what? You sound terrible... No what- Sure I- Whatta yuh what kind of an emergency?... No well stay there. Stay there I'll come over right now. I'll come over right now. Just stay there I'll come right over.

name: CAROL
lines_with_token: Hello... Oh my God who did that to you?

name: AUSTIN
movie: austin powers: international man of mystery
lines_with_token: Hello hello. That's Dr. Evil's cat.
'Pardon me for being rude It was not me it was my food. It just popped up to say hello and now it's gone back down below.'

name: BASIL EXPOSITION
movie: austin powers: international man of mystery
lines_with_token: Hello Austin. This is Basil Exposition Chief of British Intelligence. You're Austin Powers International Man of Mystery and you're with Agent Mrs. Kensington. The year is 1967 and you're talking on a picture phone.

Hello Austin this is Basil Exposition from British Intelligence. Thank you for confirming the link between Dr. Evil and Virtucon. Find out what part Virtucon plays in something called Project Vulcan. I'll need you and Vanessa to get on that immediately.

Hello Austin. Hello Vanessa. This is Basil Exposition from British Intelligence. There's a company in Las Vegas called Virtucon that we think may be linked to Dr. Evil. Many of the Virtucon executives gamble at the hotel/casino where you'll be staying. That's the first place you should look. Well I'm off to the chat rooms.

name: DR. EVIL
movie: austin powers: international man of mystery
lines_with_token: Hello Scott. I'm your father Dr. Evil. I have a son! I have a son! Everyone I have a son! Someday Scott this will all be yours.

name: MRS. KENSINGTON
movie: austin powers: international man of mystery
lines_with_token: Oh hello Vanessa. How was the flight?

name: MUSTAFA
movie: austin powers: international man of mystery
lines_with_token: Hello up there! Anyone! Can someone call an ambulance? I'm in quite a lot of pain.

name: THERAPIST

lines_with_token: That was great Mr. Keon Dave. Thank you. OK group we have two new member. Say hello to Scott and his father Mr.... Ehville?

name: MANTINI
lines_with_token: Hello Schwartz. I saw your show.

name: MAXINE
lines_with_token: Yes hello I wanted to place an ad. Hi are you Craig's wife?

name: JEFFREY
lines_with_token: You said hello to Frank. You wanted to talk to someone? Don? And little Donny. You said something about Momma loves you. And something about a Meadow Lane. Something in an hour. I don't remember any more.
Hello uh my name is Jeffrey Beaumont. Is Detective Williams in?

Ah ... hello Mrs Terrain. SAM lets go of the parcel and pushes JILL away. She moves off.

name: FRANK
lines_with_token: Hello I'm Frank Pierce from the ambulance last night. I brought your father into the hospital and I just learned some news.
